name: Release 1.0
body:
## :rocket: Features

- Python 3.10 support.
- Django 4.0 support.

## :rocket: Features

- 288dfe5 Support subject search

## :wrench: Chores and Improvements

- 92078ef Release 0.18.2

## :package: Other

- e2c6f1a Fix missing link

## :wrench: Chores and Improvements

- bb47931 Release 0.18.1

## :package: Other

- d70d5f4 Fix documentation config

## :rocket: Features

- 33bf3b6 add support for batchWithTemplates

## :wrench: Chores and Improvements

- a056ae4 Release 0.18.0
- 1378c30 Update pre-commit hooks

## :package: Other

- e8dda64 Add a changelog entry

## :rocket: Features

- 37af8e9 `root_api_url` argument for `PostmarkClient`

## :wrench: Chores and Improvements

- f46d0eb Release 0.17.1

## :package: Other

- a86e138 Fix sphinx warnings

## :bug: Bug fixes

- c64348a Make `TemplateID` not required if `TemplateAlias` is specified

## :wrench: Chores and Improvements

- f759727 Release 0.17.0
- 78fc83c Drop support for Python 3.5

## :package: Other

- 830462f Merge pull request #191 from Stranger6667/dd/template-alias-fix

fix: Make `TemplateID` not required if `TemplateAlias` is specified

## :rocket: Features

- a96cac8 Implement MessageStream support

## :wrench: Chores and Improvements

- c42f1e3 Release 0.16.0
- 814e3c4 Remove obsolete setup.cfg

## :package: Other

- af4731d Add missing release notes
- 669189c Add CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md

## :wrench: Chores and Improvements

- 59871c9 Release 0.15.0
- a4211f9 Add gitter link
- edcf364 Add gitter link
- 5bf9865 Move to src layout
- d7b92a1 Drop another Python 2 shim
- 754296a Remove Python 2 shims
- 3aba8be Apply pylint
- 5cccb4d Add exception chaining
- 5c7db7b Apply pre-commit & add GitHub Action job for pre-commit

## :package: Other

- 9c6e278 Add release job
- 48080f6 Add GitHub Actions build for Python 3.5-3.9 and PyPy3
- 415ece4 Drop support for Python 2.7, 3.3, 3.4, PyPy2 and Jython.
- db20b64 Drop Travis CI
- 03f4cdf Create FUNDING.yml
- dd1065f Release 0.14.1

- 741bbf1 Add missing changelog entry

- 618d628 Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master'

- 1710940 Code black.

- b3efc2f At the moment, using the EmailTemplate() doesn't allow Metadata parameters.

EmailTemplate() now accept Metadata parameters.

e.g.
```
postmark.emails.EmailTemplate(
	TemplateId=template_id,
	TemplateAlias=template_alias,
	From=f"{from_name} {from_}",
	To=user.email,
	Headers={"X-Accept-Language": "en-us, en"},
	TemplateModel=template_model,
	Metadata=metadata
)
```

name: Release 0.14.1
body:
### Added

- Support for `Metadata` option in `EmailTemplate`. #184

name: Release 0.14.0
body:
### Added

- `verifydkim` and `verifyreturnpath` for domains API. #183

name: Release 0.13.1
body:
### Added

- Support for metadata in Django email backend. #181

name: Release 0.13.0
body:
### Added

- Support for Python 3.7. #170
- Support for `Metadata` option. #168

### Changed

- Stream logs to `sys.stdout` by default. #159

### Removed

- Support for Python 2.6, 3.2 and 3.3.

name: Release 0.12.2
body:
#### Changed

- Make `mock` package optional on Python 2. #158, #162

name: Release 0.12.1
body:
#### Changed

- Better handling of exceptions that happen during response parsing. #163

name: Release 0.12.0
body:
### Added

- Support for `TemplateAlias`. #150

### Fixed

- Processing of alternatives together with attachments. #148
- Processing of `message/rfc822` attachments.

name: Release 0.11.3
body:
- Ability to convert inbound messages to MIME instances. #90
- Fix missed `mock` dependency for Python 2. #145

name: Release 0.11.2
body: - Alternative instantiation method - ``from_config``.

name: Release 0.11.1
body: - Test helpers. #112

name: Release 0.11.0
body:
- ``message`` property for ``Bounce``, ``Delivery`` and ``Open`` classes to access corresponding ``OutboundMessage`` instance. #119
- An ability to control timeout and retries behaviour. #82
- Signal for exceptions in Django backend. #126
- Tornado helper. #85

name: Release 0.10.1
body:
### Fixed

- Fix Bcc ignoring in Django backend. #135

name: Release 0.10.0
body:
### Added

- Short-circuit send of empty batches in Django backend. #123

### Changed

- ``OutboundMessageManager.get_details`` and ``InboundMessageManager.get_details`` were methods were renamed to ``get``. Now they returns ``OutboundMessage`` and ``InboundMessage`` instances respectively. #125
- Renamed ``token`` kwarg in `PostmarkClient` to ``server_token``. #130

### Fixed

- Fix counting of successfully sent messages in Django backend. #122
- Propagate API exceptions in Django backend. #128

name: Release 0.9.2
body:
### Fixed

- Remove stale files from the package.

name: Release 0.9.1
body:
### Fixed

- Fix packaging issue.

name: Release 0.9.0
body:
- Added an ability to load all items without specifying exact `count` value. #106
- Added delivery webhook wrapper. #95
- Added open webhook wrapper. #96
- Added bounce webhook wrapper. #97
- Fixed PyPI package display. #116

#### Changed

- ``postmarker.webhooks.InboundWebhook`` class was superseded by ``postmark.messages.inbound.InboundMessage`` constructor, which works in the same way.

name: Release 0.8.1
body: - Fixed needless requests when `count` is more than number of available items. `#107`_

name: Release 0.8.0
body:
- Added an ability to download more than 500 items. #70
- Added `pre_send` and `post_send` Django signals. #83
- Inbound rules triggers API. #75
- Changed logs output stream to default ``sys.stderr``. #102
- Tags triggers API. #74

name: Release 0.7.2
body: - Fixed Django backend crash with attachments. #98

name: Release 0.7.1
body: - Added `VERBOSITY` option to the Django backend. #92

name: Release 0.7.0
body:
- Stats API. #72
- Sender Signatures API. #73
- Messages API. #71
- Inbound webhook wrapper. #87

name: Release 0.6.2
body: - Fixed Unicode string handling on Python 2. #78

name: Release 0.6.1
body: - Fixed handling of `quoted-printable` payload. #76

name: Release 0.6.0
body:
- Support for link tracking. #62
- Better exceptions handling. #50
- Support for spam check API. #57
- Inline images support. #52
- Domains API. #64

name: Release 0.5.3
body: - Tags for Django messages. #59

name: Release 0.5.2
body: - Fixed headers decoding. #60

name: Release 0.5.1
body:
- Fixed invalid messages count in email batches. #55
- Better Django support. #51

name: Release 0.5.0
body:
- Status API. #39
- Custom user agent. #43
- Jython support. #13
- Handle more than 500 emails in batches. #46
- Templates API. #15

name: Release 0.4.0
body:
- Python 3.2 support. #38
- Refactoring. `ServerClient` & `AccountClient` were removed. #41

name: Release 0.3.0
body:
- Pass extra settings to `Django` backend. #29
- Testing feature for `Django` backend. #27
- Logging. #19
- Server API. #14
- Improved attachments support. #23
- Improved MIME messages support. #28

name: Release 0.2.0
body:
- Django email backend. #16
- Support for `MIMEText` sending. #25
- Batch emailing implementation. #12
- Ability to remove headers from email message. #24
- Improved attachments interface. #18
- Support for sending single email. #11

name: Release 0.1.1
body: Fixed packaging

name: Release 0.1.0
body:
Initial release!

Basic support for Postmark API - only Bounce API.
